title: Figurine
description: faience figurine of a female on a typical grassy knoll; a group of rocks and tree stump to her left; tromp l\'oeil marble stand with basin to left; small sprays of indianische blumen type flowers on dress, of finer workmanship than in other areas
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in Memory of her father Mr. Thomas Shevlin
